name: Higurashi Daybreak Portable
summary: This game is an enhanced port of the doujin game for PC "Higurashi Daybreak". It was developed by Cavia with the assistance from the original makers, Twilight Frontier and 07th Expansion. The port boasts revamped character graphics to match Alchemist's previous Higurashi ports, new storylines for Hanyuu and Natsumi, new costumes and weapons, a new opening animation with a theme song, as well as a "shop" feature.
